tool_description: Manages collection, verification, and storage of required volunteer documents such as ID, certifications, and agreements.

volunteer_id.description: ID of volunteer whose documents to collect

auto_verify.description: Whether to attempt automatic document verification

error_messages: Invalid volunteer ID: Volunteer ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid document types: One or more document types are not recognized.
Invalid deadline: Submission deadline must be a future date in ISO 8601 format.
Collection setup failed: Unable to set up document collection for this volunteer.
usage: Provide volunteer ID, list of required documents, and submission deadline. Optionally enable automatic verification. The tool sets up document collection and tracking.

collection_id.description: Unique identifier for the document collection

upload_portal_url.description: URL where volunteer can upload documents

document_checklist.description: Checklist of documents with submission status

reminder_schedule.description: Scheduled reminder dates for document submission
